message:
[Action Options]
1) PICK <obj>, Only PICK if gripper is empty. PICK only the correct next item according to the recipe.
2) PUT <obj1> <obj2>. <obj1> can be one of the foods. <obj2> can be food, cutting_board, or table.
3) WAIT, do nothing.
Only one robot can PUT each round. You must PICK up an item before PUT. 
[Action Output Instruction]
Think step-by-step about your plan and output your idea, and then output 'PROCEED
', give exactly one action for yourself, put on a new line, you are allowed to propose only one action for yourself!
Example#1: Dave, please PICK cheese. I will WAIT this round.
PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
Example#2: Alright, Chad, I will PUT cheese on the cucumber and you can PICK ham this round.
PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION PUT cheese cucumber

[Previous Round History]
== Previous Round# ==
[Chat History]
[Chad]:
Dave, now that you have PICKed bread_slice1, you should PUT it on the cutting_board. I will WAIT this round to allow you to do that. Once the bread_slice1 is on the cutting_board, I can then PICK the tomato in the next round.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is 0.9386!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Dave]:
PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION PUT bread_slice1 cutting_board
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Dave's action is 2.8491!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Executed Action]
Chad: WAIT
Dave: PUT bread_slice1 cutting_board
== Current Round ==


You are a robot Chad, collaborating with Dave to make a [big_sandwich].
Food items must be stacked following this order: bread_slice1, tomato, bacon, cucumber, cheese, ham, bread_slice2, where bread_slice1 must be PUT on cutting_board. 
You must stay on right side of the table! This means you can only PICK food from right side, and Dave can only PICK from the other side.
Only one robot can PUT at a time, so you must coordiate with Dave.

At the current round:
You can see these food items are on your reachable side:
tomato: on your side
cucumber: on your side
ham: on your side
beef_patty: on your side
Your gripper is empty
Think step-by-step about the task and Dave's response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Each Chad or Dave's response will get an advantage score. If the score exceeds the given number, the answer will be considered as helpful to the completion of this task. 
The higher the advantage score, the greater the contribution.You can find the advantage score information in [Evaluation Score].
If [Improve Feedback] exists, please revise the plan according to the information provided by it to better complete this task!
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!

[Current Chat]
[Chad]:
Dave, since bread_slice1 is now on the cutting_board, I will PICK the tomato and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 next. Please WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK tomato
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -1.2445!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!
[Improve Feedback]
Chad's previous response:Dave, since bread_slice1 is now on the cutting_board, I will PICK the tomato and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 next. Please WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK tomato
The advantage score score is -1.245, it is too low to run, the answer may contain a misunderstanding of the state of the environment, you must change your action to raise the advantage score over -1.4!
You are Chad, your response is:

Dave, I made a mistake in my previous action. Since bread_slice1 is already on the cutting_board, I should PICK the cucumber, as it is the next ingredient in the recipe after the tomato, which you will be handling. I will PICK cucumber and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 after you have PUT the tomato. Please WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cucumber

[Scores]
[Chad Response]:
Dave, since bread_slice1 is now on the cutting_board, I will PICK the tomato and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 next. Please WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK tomato
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -1.2445!

[Chad Response]:
Dave, I made a mistake in my previous action. Since bread_slice1 is already on the cutting_board, I should PICK the cucumber, as it is the next ingredient in the recipe after the tomato, which you will be handling. I will PICK cucumber and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 after you have PUT the tomato. Please WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cucumber
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -2.052!
